name: Vereniging Nationale Jeugdraad
goal:
The goals of the Dutch National Youth Council are:

To stimulate and support the participation of youth at all levels of society; to make sure that youth know their strengths, develop themselves, and that they work towards a better future for themselves and others.
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Culture, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Youth
euInitiatives:
- EU Youth Strategy
- European Solidarity corps
- Structured Dialogue
- Erasmus +
